title: On Health Policy, Donald Trump Beats Joe Biden Hands Down
sub_head: Operation Warp Speed achieved a breakthrough at low cost. Build Back Better would spend huge sums to encourage failure.
body:
Those who want to know the difference between the Democratic and Republican philosophies of governing need only compare Joe Biden’s Build Back Better health agenda with Donald Trump’s Operation Warp Speed.
Warp Speed was focused on solving a major health problem quickly and efficiently. It had specific, ambitious goals and deadlines to produce life-saving vaccines and medical supplies. In less than a year, it spent only $18 billion to achieve the greatest health breakthrough in a generation, saving millions of lives around the globe.
